p:
Risk of spring frost damage was described by three indices. All indices were calculated from daily minimum ( T min) or daily mean temperature ( T mean) during a 100-day period starting from the DOY of BBCH09.
Index 1: DOY with daily T min below 0 °C ( T min < 0) (last day of frost, LDF)
Index 2: DOY of the last with daily T mean below 2 °C ( T mean < 2)
Index 3: sum of daily temperature deltas below the threshold of 2 °C (Σ( T mean < 2 °C)
